name: Slapality
description:
Global Game Jam 2022 Game.
Theme: "Duality"

The music is a homage to the song "Duality" by "Slipknot"

=============

Are you familiar with the struggle of choosing what to do in the morning? To go to work or to call in sick and to have couple of beers? Our hero knows it all too well. Every morning he fights with himself to decide what to do. 
You have a unique opportunity to witness (and to participate) in an internal fight, that takes form of slap competition for some reason. 

Gameplay:
2 players act in a turn base fashion.
On your turn, you have couple of seconds to charge a slap and to select a direction (if the time ends before you selected direction - you've missed your turn).
After a direction is selected, it will be then displayed and the second player will have a limited time to react.
If he presses the same direction - the slap is dodged. Opposite direction - receives double damage. Any other direction - regular damage. 

Left Player Controls:
Up = W
Down = S
Left = A
Right = D
Charge = G 

Right Player Controls:
Up = Up Arrow
Down = Down Arrow
Left = Left Arrow
Right = Right Arrow
Charge = M
